reviews.title: A Defense Attorney to Trust
reviews.description: Mr. Richards exuded self-confidence and knowledge of the law with regard to our case. He was always clear in his approach to defending our son. If we had questions or concerns, he always responded to our questions. He showed compassion. His involvement did not end after the court ruling.
reviews.name: Anonymous
